languages.text: "Ответ отрицательный — не бывает". {n}В голосе Паскаля возникают сварливые нотки, а визор зажигается алым.{/n} "Как представитель {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g}, я направляю коммунальной службе Футфола жалобу. Крематорий, в котором должно было состояться сожжение усопшего Денза Беллардо, пребывает в ненадлежащем статусе обслуживания. Две щит-станции в инфраструктуре канализации не снабжены штатным несущим блоком. И это неприемлемо!"

"Negative — it does not 'happen.'" {n}Pasqal's voice turns peevish, and his visor lights up red.{/n} "As a representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, I am registering a complaint with Footfall Station Services. The crematorium in which the burning of the late Denz Bellardo's body was to take place remains in an unsatisfactory state of maintenance. Two circuit stations within the sewer infrastructure are missing their standard support unit. That is unacceptable!"
languages.original_text: "Ответ отрицательный — не бывает". {n}В голосе Паскаля возникают сварливые нотки, а визор зажигается алым.{/n} "Как представитель {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g}, я направляю коммунальной службе Футфола жалобу. Крематорий, в котором должно было состояться сожжение усопшего Денза Беллардо, пребывает в ненадлежащем статусе обслуживания. Две щит-станции в инфраструктуре канализации не снабжены штатным несущим блоком. И это неприемлемо!"

traits.locale_text: "Negative — it does not 'happen'." {n}Pasqal's voice turns peevish, and his visor lights up red.{/n} "As a representative of the Adeptus Mechanicus, I am registering a complaint with Footfall Utility Service. The crematorium in which the burning of the late Denz Bellardo's body was to take place remains in an unsatisfactory state of maintenance. Two circuit stations within the sewer infrastructure are missing their standard support unit. And that is unacceptable!"

"Negative — it does not 'happen.'" {n}Pasqal's voice turns peevish, and his visor lights up red.{/n} "As a representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, I am registering a complaint with Footfall Station Services. The crematorium in which the burning of the late Denz Bellardo's body was to take place remains in an unsatisfactory state of maintenance. Two circuit stations within the sewer infrastructure are missing their standard support unit. That is unacceptable!"

languages.text: “并非如此，这可不是什么‘碰巧’。”{n}帕斯卡的声音变得尖锐，面甲上亮起了红灯。{/n}“身为{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}的代表，我正在对落脚港公用设备的糟糕状况进行记录。用来焚烧丹兹·贝拉多遗体的火葬场，其维护状况依然非常不尽人意。下水道基础设施的两个电站依然缺少标准的支持单元，这种事情实在是令人无法接受！”
languages.original_text: "Negative — it does not 'happen.'" {n}Pasqal's voice turns peevish, and his visor lights up red.{/n} "As a representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, I am registering a complaint with Footfall Station Services. The crematorium in which the burning of the late Denz Bellardo's body was to take place remains in an unsatisfactory state of maintenance. Two circuit stations within the sewer infrastructure are missing their standard support unit. That is unacceptable!"

traits.locale_text: “并非如此，这可不是什么‘碰巧’。”{n}帕斯卡的声音变得尖锐，面甲上亮起了红灯。{/n}“身为{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}的代表，我正在登记对落脚港公用设备的投诉信息。用来焚烧丹兹·贝拉多遗体的火葬场，其维护状况依然非常不尽人意。下水道基础设施的两个电站依然缺少标准的支持单元，这种事情实在是令人无法接受！”

languages.text: «Negativo, no son "cosas que pasan"». {n}La voz de Pasqal se vuelve irritada y su visor se ilumina en rojo.{/n} «Como representante del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, acabo de registrar una queja con los servicios de la estación de Paso. El crematorio en el que iba a celebrarse la pira del cadáver del difunto Denz Bellardo está en un estado de mantenimiento inaceptable. En dos estaciones de circuitos de la infraestructura de alcantarillado falta la unidad de apoyo estándar. ¡Esto es inaceptable!».
languages.original_text: "Negative — it does not 'happen.'" {n}Pasqal's voice turns peevish, and his visor lights up red.{/n} "As a representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, I am registering a complaint with Footfall Station Services. The crematorium in which the burning of the late Denz Bellardo's body was to take place remains in an unsatisfactory state of maintenance. Two circuit stations within the sewer infrastructure are missing their standard support unit. That is unacceptable!"

traits.locale_text: «Negativo, no son "cosas que pasan"». {n}La voz de Pasqal se vuelve irritada y su visor se ilumina en rojo.{/n} «Como representante del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, acabo de registrar una queja con los servicios de la estación de Paso. El crematorio en el que iba a celebrarse la pira del cadáver del difunto Denz Bellardo está en un estado de mantenimiento inaceptable. En dos estaciones de circuitos de la infraestructura de alcantarillado falta la unidad de apoyo estándar. ¡Esto es inaceptable!».

languages.text: 「いいや…そんなことは『ありえない』」{n}パスカルは声に苛立ちを滲ませて、マスクを赤く光らせた。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}を代表して、フットフォールステーションサービスに異議申し立てをする。亡くなられたデンツ・ベラルドの遺体を燃やす火葬場は、いまだにメンテナンスが不十分である。下水道インフラ内の2つの回路ステーションには、標準装備のサポートユニットすらない。こんなことを容認できるものか！」
languages.original_text: "Negative — it does not 'happen.'" {n}Pasqal's voice turns peevish, and his visor lights up red.{/n} "As a representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, I am registering a complaint with Footfall Station Services. The crematorium in which the burning of the late Denz Bellardo's body was to take place remains in an unsatisfactory state of maintenance. Two circuit stations within the sewer infrastructure are missing their standard support unit. That is unacceptable!"

traits.locale_text: 「いいや…そんなことは『ありえない』」{n}パスカルは声に苛立ちを滲ませて、マスクを赤く光らせた。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}を代表して、フットフォールステーションサービスに異議申し立てをする。亡くなられたデンツ・ベラルドの遺体を燃やす火葬場は、いまだにメンテナンスが不十分である。下水道インフラ内の2つの回路ステーションには、標準装備のサポートユニットすらない。こんなことを容認できるものか！」

languages.text: "Negativ – so etwas 'kommt nicht vor'." {n}Pasqals Stimme klingt verdrossen, und sein Visor leuchtet rot auf.{/n} "Als Vertreter des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} reiche ich eine Beschwerde bei der Stationsverwaltung von Footfall ein. Der Wartungszustand des Krematoriums, in dem die Leiche des verstorbenen Denz Bellardo verbrannt werden sollte, ist nicht zufriedenstellend. Zwei Wachstationen der Kanalisationsinfrastruktur fehlt die standardmäßig vorgesehene Unterstützungseinheit. Das ist völlig inakzeptabel!"
languages.original_text: "Negative — it does not 'happen.'" {n}Pasqal's voice turns peevish, and his visor lights up red.{/n} "As a representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, I am registering a complaint with Footfall Station Services. The crematorium in which the burning of the late Denz Bellardo's body was to take place remains in an unsatisfactory state of maintenance. Two circuit stations within the sewer infrastructure are missing their standard support unit. That is unacceptable!"

traits.locale_text: "Negativ – so etwas 'kommt nicht vor'." {n}Pasqals Stimme klingt verdrossen, und sein Visor leuchtet rot auf.{/n} "Als Vertreter des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} reiche ich eine Beschwerde bei der Stationsverwaltung von Footfall ein. Der Wartungszustand des Krematoriums, in dem die Leiche des verstorbenen Denz Bellardo verbrannt werden sollte, ist nicht zufriedenstellend. Zwei Wachstationen der Kanalisationsinfrastruktur fehlt die standardmäßig vorgesehene Unterstützungseinheit. Das ist völlig inakzeptabel!"

languages.text: « Non, ce ne sont pas des choses qui "arrivent". » {n}La voix de Pasqal se fait agacée, et sa visière s'illumine de rouge.{/n} « En tant que représentant de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, je dépose une plainte auprès des services de la station Castel. Le crématorium où le corps de Denz Bellardo devait être incinéré est actuellement dans un état déplorable. Il manque à deux stations-circuits de l'infrastructure des égouts leur unité de soutien standard. C'est inacceptable ! »
languages.original_text: "Negative — it does not 'happen.'" {n}Pasqal's voice turns peevish, and his visor lights up red.{/n} "As a representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, I am registering a complaint with Footfall Station Services. The crematorium in which the burning of the late Denz Bellardo's body was to take place remains in an unsatisfactory state of maintenance. Two circuit stations within the sewer infrastructure are missing their standard support unit. That is unacceptable!"

traits.locale_text: « Non, ce ne sont pas des choses qui "arrivent". » {n}La voix de Pasqal se fait agacée, et sa visière s'illumine de rouge.{/n} « En tant que représentant de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, je dépose une plainte auprès des services de la station Castel. Le crematorium où le corps de Denz Bellardo devait être incinéré est actuellement dans un état déplorable. Il manque à deux stations-circuits de l'infrastructure des égouts leur unité de soutien standard. C'est inacceptable ! »

languages.text: "Olumsuz. 'Olmaz' öyle arada." {n}Pasqal'ın sesi hırçınlaşıyor, vizörü kırmızı kırmızı yanıyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} temsilcisi olarak Binliman İstasyonu Hizmetleri'ne resmî şikâyette bulunuyorum. Merhum Denz Bellardo'nun cesedinin yakılacağı krematoryumun bakımı yetersiz seviyede. Kanalizasyon altyapısı bünyesindeki iki devre istasyonunun standart destek birimleri de eksik. Kabul edilemez!"
languages.original_text: "Negative — it does not 'happen.'" {n}Pasqal's voice turns peevish, and his visor lights up red.{/n} "As a representative of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, I am registering a complaint with Footfall Station Services. The crematorium in which the burning of the late Denz Bellardo's body was to take place remains in an unsatisfactory state of maintenance. Two circuit stations within the sewer infrastructure are missing their standard support unit. That is unacceptable!"

traits.locale_text: "Olumsuz. 'Olmaz' öyle arada." {n}Pasqal'ın sesi huysuzlaşıyor ve vizörü kırmızı yanıyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} temsilcisi olarak Binliman İstasyonu Hizmetleri'ne resmi bir şikâyette bulunacağım. Rahmetli Denz Bellardo'nun cesedinin yakılacağı krematoryumun bakımı kifayetsiz kalmış. Kanalizasyon altyapısı içindeki iki istasyonun standart destek birimi de eksik. Bu kabul edilemez!"
